Item.name: Alien Power Cell Socket
Item.description: A socket with a hole of a shape of one of those alien power cells, purchased at research outposts or found in wrecks

Item.name: Jovian Diving Armor
Item.description: Piece of extremely hard moloch shell, forged together with diving suit using alien metals and mucus. High mechanical skill significantly shortens crafting time.

Item.name: Ancient Mace
Item.description: Terrible blunt Weapon of Ancient design, capable of using alien ores using complicated chemical proceses. High weapon skill significantly shortens crafting time.
Terrible weapon that unleashes a beam of destruction using complicated energetical processes. High electrical skill significantly shortens crafting time.

Item.name: Ancient Icon
Item.description: Heavy ornament made from alien metals.
